page.title: 01 INTRODUCTION
page.content: This block 04760168}consists of an area to the{S.W. of Wokingham}town centre. The block includes three distinct regions giving contrasts in land cover and amenities.These are:_ 1.The{S.W.}outskirts of{Wokingham}town centre:_a suburban area adjacent to the A239 Reading Road.} 2.{Woosehill:}_a large,new,developing residential area to the{S.W. of {Wokingham.}A growth development well situated for the M4 and offering a range of modern housing. 3.{Bearwood:}_ a village surrounded by a largely rural landscape sited to the S.W.of{Wokingham.}The village atmosphere is maintained despite the proximity of the{new Woosehill {development.} { Three schools, situated one in each {region surveyed the block. { }
